content: DBS Vickers Securities Investments General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 21 Aug 2018How do I sell stocks that are bought using DBS Vickers cash upfront trades? What is the platform with lowest selling fee?I'm new to investing. Thank you!1 answerAnswerBump0

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 15 Sep 2018Yes, you can sell stocks that were bought using DBS cash upfront. However, they will be subjected to the commission charges shown here: https://www.dbs.com.sg/vickers/en/pricing/fee-schedules/singapore-accountsAs for your second question, the answer can be found here: https://blog.seedly.sg/the-ultimate-cheatsheet-cheapest-stock-brokerage-in-singapore/â€‹Good luck!0 comments0
